title: Enhancing Clinical Practical Competencies: Improving Perception of Teaching Presence in Online/Hybrid Writing Courses

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the teaching presence (design, facilitation, and direct instruction) elements of the CoI framework with 80%+ accuracy.
Learners can propose at least three instructional strategies for providing individualized feedback in online/hybrid environments.
Learners can complete two or more mini-projects to facilitate group discussions and interactions using only mobile devices.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
